project.description: Build Container OS DiskImage on IMX8MM Yocto SUMO with kernel 4.14.98 (internal)

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -x -e
cat > site.conf <<EOF # u-boot-edm.bb #SRCSERVER_pn-u-boot-edm = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/uboot-imx-edm.git" #SRCBRANCH_pn-u-boot-edm = "tn-imx_v2018.03_4.14.98_2.0.0_ga-wip-bootscript" #SRCOPTIONS_pn-u-boot-edm = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" #SRCREV_pn-u-boot-edm = "048fa2fd96c898c4cc9e12219cba2a4f00ceef52"
# u-boot-script.bb #SRCSERVER_pn-u-boot-script = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/uboot-imx-edm.git" #SRCOPTIONS_pn-u-boot-script = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw"
# linux-firmware-brcm-tn.bb SRCSERVER_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/brcm_firmware.git" SRCBRANCH_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "master" SRCOPTIONS_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRCREV_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "317394ca84258e4f11a138014820eebf0c43db1e" SRC_URI_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "\${SRCSERVER};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" S_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "\${WORKDIR}/git"
# linux-firmware-qca-tn.bb SRCSERVER_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/qca_firmware.git" SRCBRANCH_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "caf-wlan/CNSS.LEA.NRT_3.0" SRCOPTIONS_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRCREV_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "\${AUTOREV}" SRC_URI_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "\${SRCSERVER};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" S_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "\${WORKDIR}/git"
# linux-tn-imx.bb #KERNEL_SRC_pn-linux-tn-imx = "git://10.20.30.20:/volume1/internal_git/edm/tn-kernel.git" #SRCBRANCH_pn-linux-tn-imx = "tn-imx_4.14.98_2.0.0_ga-wip-sdmafix" #SRCOPTIONS_pn-linux-tn-imx = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" #SRCREV_pn-linux-tn-imx = "5b97eae48fd356d280815cb6088eff79570735f9" #SRC_URI_pn-linux-tn-imx = "\${KERNEL_SRC};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" EOF
cat > local_manifest.xml <<EOF <manifest> <remote name="internal" fetch="ssh://rdsw@10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm" />
<remove-project name="meta-tn-imx-bsp" /> <project name="meta-tn-imx-bsp" remote="internal" path="sources/meta-tn-imx-bsp" revision="sumo_4.14.98-2.0.0_GA-next" > <linkfile src="tools/edm-setup-release.sh" dest="edm-setup-release.sh"/> <linkfile src="tools/setup-environment.sh" dest="setup-environment"/> <linkfile src="README" dest="README-TechNexion-BSP"/> </project> </manifest> EOF
